category.name: Product Structure.QSearch Configuration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: QS_remote_master_site
preference.preference_description: Specifies one or more remote sites at which the cacheless search engine executes searches. Only set this preference if you use cacheless searches in a Multi-Site Collaboration environment. Valid Values: One or more key value pairs, each comprising a product ID and its owning master site, for example: Product2:remote site2 Product3:remote site3
